course_title: Epidemiology of Foodborne and Diarrheal Diseases
class_notes: This is a half semester course which meets during the 2nd half of the semester.  Pre-requisite: EPI 530 (concurrent ok) or EPI 504.
course_description: Prerequisite/concurrent: EPI 504 or EPI 530.  This course covers the basic epidemiology of infectious foodborne and diarrheal diseases of the United States and the world. Uses the study of these diseases and outbreak investigations to develop broadly applicable epidemiologic skills. Explores dynamic relationship between changing global environment and human health distribution, changes in the human population.
